description: The story revolves around a race that seeks to dominate the galaxy. A lone mysterious female warrior, known to others as Emeraldas sails the endless planets of the universe- in her Seas of Star ship- fighting the tyranny of that m...
keywords: tv mini series,space,based on manga,outer space,pirate
name: Queen Emeraldas

review.name: One of the Best!
review.reviewBody: When I first watched this film on the Action Channel,I gotta say that this is one of the best films since the series "Star Blazers". This film was so great, I had to get this for my collection,and I did. I really did like it after I bought it, and it was just like watching it again, on the Action Channel. I really do like Emeraldes, and I also liked her ship. What this anime tells us that life can be hard, and can also be an adventure. We all have to work hard, so we can achieve that goal, and we also have friends to watch our back. I do think that this is one of the best motion pictures to see. So in closing, if you have seen it on Action,then this is the one. You will see what I mean.

trailer.description: Home Video Trailer from ADV Films
trailer.name: Queen Emeraldas
